summary: Implements a Longformer-specific tokenizer built on byte-level BPE, handling spaces as part of tokens and providing utilities for converting text to token IDs, managing special tokens, and preparing inputs for the Longformer model.
business_intent: Facilitates preprocessing of raw text for Longformer-based NLP applications, enabling accurate tokenization, special token insertion, and input formatting required for tasks such as classification, question answering, and language modeling.
